duties_responsibilities.duty: Enhance organizational health and capacity of Vermont's housing non-profits to be effective stewards of permanently affordable housing.
Provide technical assistance, evaluate organizational systems, and assess the need for operating support.
Monitor the long-term performance and sustainability of housing projects with VHCB funding.
Collect and evaluate data and performance trends to make and oversee implementation of recommendations for improvement.
Manage and make recommendations to improve VHCB's stewardship systems for adequate oversight of housing projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Non-Profit Management or related field (Master's preferred)
